title: Davidvictorson
author: Davidvictorson
content: I have a friend who used to be so crazy about sports betting. He would bet on live sports and simulated leagues. On some days, his strategy will be to bet on a specific outcome within the game. While on other days, he'd bet on overall outcomes within the game. Sadly, he has lost more times than he won. One day, everything changed when he discovered online crypto casinos. It was as if a new world had opened up. He would spend most of his time on slots, dice, table, and games... When I asked his reason for abandoning sports betting for online crypto casinos. He told me that aside from being able to receive payment in bitcoins, he loved the instant winnings that the online casinos offer. Secondly, online casino games are less stressful than sports betting.  He explained that sports betting requires knowledge of the sports and sophisticated strategies to win.  I cannot tell if he is better off in terms of winning in his online casino games than he did in sports betting. So between sports betting and online casino games, which do you prefer?

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on June 10, 2022, 10:06:09 PM.... So between sports betting and online casino games, which do you prefer?Sportsbetting. Yes this require more skills but it also gives you more control unlike luck-based casino games. I also don't have to deal with the house edge hehe.QuoteHe told me that aside from being able to receive payment in bitcoins, he loved the instant winnings that the online casinos offer.Does he not know about bookies that accepts deposits and pays in crypto? QuoteSecondly, online casino games are less stressful than sports betting.Less thinking or analysis is what he means I guess. Wait until he starts losing and strategies doesn't seem to work.

comments.author: btc_angela
comments.body: I guess if you followed several sports then sports betting might be good for you. Online casino games like slots? the odds for us to win is very slim so it's not even comparable to sports betting per se.Maybe your friend just wanted to find a way to continue his gambling habits and recover some of his lost money on sports betting. Maybe he just have a string of bad luck in sports betting that he needs some fresh air to think so he play different games. Nevertheless, if he is smart enough, he knows his chances are not the good. So for me I prefer sports betting.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: I prefer online casino games to sports betting because I am not very good at gathering information to choose a team with a chance to win. In addition, sports betting also takes time to wait for the final result.If your friend knows that sports betting also accepts payments using bitcoin and altcoins, they will like sports betting and can continue their previous habit. Everyone has their own reasons for which one they will choose to bet on.

comments.author: Doell
comments.body: Online casinos are fun, fast and easy to play whatever the game, while sports tend to think and analyze. I personally prefer both, any gambling is basically the same, looking for fun and whatever it is  dice slot card games etc there have a strategy. That don't rely only luck the surefire trick is to play casually, live sports for gamblers who want adrenaline, analysis can be more correct when you watch on live.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Both are risky and you have to invest what you can afford to lose, your friends don't want to deal with strategies associated with sports betting and luck-based games are a no-brainer and much more exciting as your winnings are easily accessible, its still based on gamblers preferences there are gamblers who are good in analysis and there are gamblers who just want to enjoy the game and luck-based games are more enjoyable then sports betting, but the most important thing is you are not passing your limit on betting and you enjoy the experience.

comments.author: qwertyup23
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on June 10, 2022, 10:06:09 PMWhen I asked his reason for abandoning sports betting for online crypto casinos. He told me that aside from being able to receive payment in bitcoins, he loved the instant winnings that the online casinos offer. Secondly, online casino games are less stressful than sports betting.  He explained that sports betting requires knowledge of the sports and sophisticated strategies to win.  I cannot tell if he is better off in terms of winning in his online casino games than he did in sports betting. So between sports betting and online casino games, which do you prefer?I agree with the points raised by your friend but it all boils down to personal preference.As explained by your friend, online casino games are instant- meaning a person bets and the outcome is showed to you within seconds after the round ends in a current game. While some games require pure luck (e.g. slots, etc.), there are some card games that require some degree of techniques in order to at least reduce the risks you are facing (e.g. poker, etc.).With regard to sports betting, knowledge about the given sport is definitely essential. If you have some data to formulate a hypothesis on who would win in a given match, then you are somehow reducing the odds of failure. The problem is, the winnings can be realized later on after the game ends.Personally, I would choose sports betting since it is relatively safer compared to online casino games. Though there may be a delay in profit materialization, at least the risks involved aren't that high compared to playing slots, poker, or any related online casino games.

comments.author: Hydrogen
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on June 10, 2022, 10:06:09 PM He explained that sports betting requires knowledge of the sports and sophisticated strategies to win.  That is true.I'm prone towards overthinking and overanalyzing topics. If I lose a bet in sports gambling, I think about it for days sometimes. Until I can better define what went wrong and hopefully not make the same mistake in the future. Sometimes I wonder if I invest more thought and strategy into my sports gambling than generals on real life battlefields invest into waging war. There would never be soldiers digging trenches in a radioactive chernobyl red forest to be found in any of my sports line ups.Dice does carry a lower curve which is better suited for those who want to gamble on fast money without having to worry over details or statistics. Having a winning mentality and winning belief which allows a person to consistently roll the dice needed to win. Eye of the tiger, heart of the cards. Dice is closer to poker in terms of players not being able to alter the cards they're dealt with strategies or clever tactics but still potentially being able to come out as a winner.

comments.author: agustina2
comments.body: I prefer sports betting rather than online casino games for the simple reason that I don't want to rely alone on luck. Of course, there's no easy gambling that's why sports betting needs an analysis. But the wonderful thing about doing sports betting is, that we can increase our chances of winning with our knowledge compared to online casinos where no strategy is needed and we have to just depend on our luck.Feel sad that your friend doesn't have any good experience in sports betting but he might get wrecked more if he will now play mostly at online casinos.

comments.body: I don't understand how your friend ended up abandoning sports betting. You said that he is crazy about sports betting before therefore I'm expecting by now that he already has a good experience in doing it and his knowledge about sports betting is now on the highest level as he is crazy in the first place. Then that thing changed because he is now playing online casino games?What changes you are pointing out here that your friend discovers in casino games that overcome his bad experience in sports betting?About profits?About the probability of winning?About the convenience?About the difficulties?About everything and etc.I'm sure the most situation we can see is that gambler shifts from playing online casinos to sports betting and not the other way around.Well, just my observation though.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: That's not a whole new world, it's a worse and deeper hell than sports betting lmao. Sports betting is a waaaay more better (subjective, don't judge me), than casino games, and I've tried both. Sports betting has that sense where you don't rely on luck but rather on analysis and studying. And imo, you can even determine the winner without having the need to study it that intensively, with the knowledge of the basics of the game and the teams that are playing you can already assume who can win. Though I guess if your friend wants to turn off his brain, then yea simple games like dice and slots would work. Probably the thrill of finding something new imo, I reckon he'd come back to sports after a few months.

comments.body: I find this story quite contradictory...Sports betting has a much more predictable outcome and is easier to win if you have the right strategies and bet only on championship matches where you have good knowledge.Obviously the yields are much lower, so I understand they are a lot more boring as well.I still prefer sports betting, but I confess that I couldn't give up online casinos, they are also very fun and very good to spend that extra buck.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: IMO sports betting is where your knowledge and skills can be applied. A few casino games may need some knowledge and skills in order to be profitable, but that isn't always the case since luck is still a huge factor on said games. In the end, player preference would still prevail. If your buddy is enjoying somewhat on casino and making "easy money" then there's nothing wrong with that. Or he could learn the sport he wants to bet on and make big, consistent bucks.
